snippet: With the nation’s economy in crisis, the body’s refugee agency said the Continent had a responsibility to help deal with the surge.
abstract: United Nations issues warning that Greece and its Balkan neighbors are being overwhelmed by large number of migrants fleeing Syria and other conflict areas; UN calls on European countires to do more to avert humanitarian crisis, particularly given economic crisis in Greece.
lead_paragraph: With the nation’s economy in crisis, the body’s refugee agency said the Continent had a responsibility to help deal with the surge.

headline.main: U.N., Warning of Migrant Crisis in Greece, Urges Europe to Act
headline.print_headline: Europe Is Urged to Help Greece Manage Crisis of New Arrivals

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
